title: Agentic-Tools MCP Advanced Features Verified
details:
Successfully verified ALL advanced agentic-tools MCP features are available and working:

✅ CONFIRMED TOOLS:
1. create_project / list_projects / get_project / update_project / delete_project
2. create_task / list_tasks / get_task / update_task / delete_task / move_task
3. create_memory / search_memories / get_memory / list_memories / update_memory / delete_memory
4. get_next_task_recommendation - AI-powered task prioritization based on dependencies, priority, complexity
5. analyze_task_complexity - Identifies overly complex tasks and suggests breakdown
6. parse_prd - Parses Product Requirements Documents into structured tasks automatically
7. infer_task_progress - Analyzes codebase to detect task completion from code evidence
8. generate_research_queries - Creates intelligent search queries for task research
9. research_task - (implied via generate_research_queries)

All tools tested with test project "MCP Workflow Optimization Test" (ID: 31b7badb-eff2-45b8-9cb5-fbfb94bc1fd7).

Key findings:
- Task management supports unlimited hierarchy with parentId
- Tasks support: priority (1-10), complexity (1-10), status (pending/in-progress/blocked/done), tags, dependsOn, estimatedHours, actualHours
- Memory search uses intelligent multi-field relevance scoring
- PRD parsing automatically creates tasks with priorities extracted from HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW indicators
- Progress inference analyzes code files for task-related keywords and modifications
- Recommendation engine uses scoring: Priority×4 + (11-Complexity)×10

Implementation verified on 2025-11-21.
